availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Trimble County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Catharine Abbott Spillman in Oldham County, Kentucky in March 1836. Father of Caswill Spillman, Martha Spillman, Mildred Spillman, George Spillman, Mary Spillman, Francis Spillman, and Margaret Ann Spillman. Farmer in Trimble County, Kentucky in 1850. Farmer in Trimble County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Trimble County, District 2, p. 392A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Trimble County, p. 199.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Oldham County Marriages, Film #000482445, p. 37.
